kvs.page-description: Any individual holding Fair tokens automatically joins the FAIR DAO. If you have spare time, you can also participate in the development and operation of the FAIR DAO projects.

worker-items.name: Join DAO
worker-items.des: You automatically become a member of the FAIR DAO organization by holding Fair tokens.

worker-items.name: Get Tokens
worker-items.des: Currently, tokens can only be purchased on the SunPump official website.

worker-items.name: Participate in Dev
worker-items.des: If you are a programmer, UI designer, translator, etc., we welcome you to participate in the development and operation of the FAIR DAO project.
